import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' import SearchBox from '../components/SearchBox.js' import { listProducts } from '../actions/productActions' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const dispatch = useDispatch() const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList) const {products, error, loading, pages} = productList console.log(pages) useEffect(() => { for (let i = 1; i <= pages; i++) { dispatch(listProducts()) } }, [dispatch]) const allProducts = pages.flatMap(page => page.results); const uniqueCategories = [...new Set(allProducts.map(product => product.category))]; return (

NutriNation
About Us Cart {!error && ( Categories}> {uniqueCategories.map(category => ( {category} ))} )} {userInfo ? ( Hi, {userInfo.name}!} id='username' style={{ fontSize: '1.1rem' }}> Profile Log Out ) : ( <> Log In Register ) } {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && ( Admin} id='adminmenu' style={{ fontSize: '1.1rem' }}> Users Products Orders Promo Codes )}
) } export default Header
